MTRR supported PAT supported
PAT 0x0007040600070406 (default)
0x6000000000->0x6000000000 MTRR 0=UC PTE2 bits 0x0000006000000083 PAT 0->6=WB
0x6000200000->0x6000200000 MTRR 0=UC PTE2 bits 0x00000060002000A3 PAT 0->6=WB
0x6000400000->0x6000400000 MTRR 0=UC PTE2 bits 0x00000060004000A3 PAT 0->6=WB
0x6000600000->0x6000600000 MTRR 0=UC PTE2 bits 0x0000006000600083 PAT 0->6=WB
